markdownRemark.html: Make time to connect with people. It’s harder to find the time to connect because there’s almost no happenstance meetings. The pandemic has only exacerbated, not caused, these conditions. Use the tools available to connect with most meaningful people in a personal manner.

frontmatter.description: The pandemic has only exacerbated, not caused, these conditions. Use the tools available to connect with most meaningful people in a personal manner.
frontmatter.title: Prioritize people
